item.title: Rolling the Dice: Imagining Generative AI as a Dungeons & Dragons Storytelling Companion
item.description: In this blog post, I discuss my research on using Generative AI to enhance Dungeons & Dragons gameplay by dynamically generating narratives and character interactions, providing guidelines for AI integration based on real game scenarios.
